attributes.action: answer why inflation is 2.4??% annually and gas goes up 17.6?%, elec 12.4?%, council tax 4?% and so on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are constantly told how low inflation is but we see no relation to annual figures by the government and to increases we pay in fuel, petrol, diesel, elec, food bills and more. Then we get minimal pay rises if any. These figures are obviously massaged or badly explained to we the public. I'm sick of more costs but advised how better it all is! So PM tell us some truths.

rejection.details: This is not a clear call for action by the Government. You can obtain the information you require from a host of other sources relating to economics.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
